text: (napiye! â€˜â€˜Ivveta vacanankalai romiliruntu vantirukkum) oru (kiristava) manitantan niccayamaka umakkuk karruk kotukkiran; (iraivan karrukkotukkavillai)'' enru avarkal kuruvatai niccayamaka nam arivom. Evan (umakkuk) karruk kotuppataka avarkal kurukirarkalo a(ntak kirista)van (arapi moliyai oru ciritum ariyata) ajami. Ivvetamo mika (nakarikamana) telivana arapi moliyil irukkiratu. (Akave, avarkal kuruvatu cariyanru)
